page.title: 10TRANSPORT
page.content: {TRIMDON AVENUE}is the main road of a large private estate.It is the only road wide enough for local buses and delivery lorries to the community shops.The majority of residents use cars for commuting to town (some 3 miles distant) whilst the health conscious use pedal cycles. {POST HOUSE MOTEL}is situated on the A1044 and serves travellers using the main N/S A19 road.Traffic using this road includes cars,lorries,commercial vans and motorcycles. {STAINTON/THORNTON}are two small villages connected by a minor road. This is a rural area,therefore traffic is normally light consisting of farm tractors,livestock transporters,the occasional car and a very infrequent bus service.Village residents use private cars as the main mode of transport.
